subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer won the Madrid Open for the third time, rallying past Tomas Berdych, 3-6, 7-5, 7-5, on Sunday and overtaking Rafael Nadal for the No. 2 ranking behind Novak Djokovic.
snippet: Roger Federer won the Madrid Open for the third time, rallying past Tomas Berdych, 3-6, 7-5, 7-5, on Sunday and overtaking Rafael Nadal for the No. 2 ranking behind Novak Djokovic.
